div.p:
Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem per balliuos dicti burgi secundo die mensis marcij
anno Domini et cetera lxxviijuo /

quo die comparens in curia mariota lichtoune constituit et ordinavit
Willelmum blindsel iuniorem et Wilelmum blindsel seniorem coniunctim et diuisim suos procuratores Ad
prosequendum legittime actionem suam aduersus Relictam quondam Roberti burnet pro Recuperacione et
acquisicione vnius agnus dei cum j chenye de auro et vno annulo auro fracto eedem relicte
inuadiat' Ipsa mariota promittens de Rato et cetera

Vxores alanj smyth / Antonij scissoris / Dauidis talyour et thome gillespy necnon Adam de
craufurd ex parte vxoris sue et Relicta Johannis Duncanj per concessiones proprias am
erciatur pro infrictione communis ordinacionis in propinacione seruisie xij denariorum
Sponsa thome symson' in amerciamento similiter pro causa antedicta et cetera

Curia legalis ballivorum burgi de aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem viijuo die marcij anno predicto
quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata et cetera

The samyn dai William androson' and Dauid gethan burgez of abirdene witnes' producit
be androu brekauch / the gret aith sworn and examinit deponis that thai war present
herd and saw and for witnes tane / quhen the said androw brekach deliuerit til quhilum
Dauid bog in handwarp alsmekil siluer as suld by demi barrel saip til him / the quhilk
thai say Dauy bog grantit to thaim / and that be the Rehers of the said androw made to
thaim in thetym it extendit til ix s' g' Als' thai declare that androw brecach for
thocht thareftir that he departit with his siluer / and askit it agane fra the said Dauy bog
the quhilk wald nocht gif it / And that than he said til Dauy bog / gif he warit
nocht his siluer as he bad / the said Dauy suld gif til him as it com til vij noblis'
for the li' g'

Eodem die comparens in curia Dauid mathoson' produxit et perlegi fecit quoddam
actum / et scripturam manualem Willelmi paterson filij et heredis quondam Dauid paterson bur
gensis huius burgi / quibus constitutus est curatus eiusdem Willelmi / et eisdem perlectis solempniter protesta
tus fuit / quod quicquid eundem Willelmum facere contigerit penes alienacionem vendicionem aut
impigneracionem terrarum aut aliarum rerum seu alias quovismodo vltra ipsius Dauidis
voluntatem et consensu dummodo esse deberet in cura et gubernacione sua curatorie sibi
Dauid aut eidem Willelmo seu heredibus suis vel aliis quorum interest nullatenus
preiudicaret temporibus pro futurum et si promissa in aliquo per eundem facta sunt aut fue
rint ut premittitur ex nunc prout extunc et equa expresse reuocat et annullat testibus
thoma de camera alexander rede Johanne stevynson tribus ballivorum Robert blindsel Dauid
howison Willelmo Kintor alexandro trail gilberto leche Waltero pyot Willelmo
moyses thoma chepman et Willelmo androson cum diuersis aliis

Item eodem die coram balliuis in Judicio personaliter constitutus Johannes hunde opidanus ville brugensis
in flandria constituit Johannem stevinson Johannem chepman in vico castri thomam chepman
et henricum van Wercon flemyngum coniunctim et diuisim suos procuratores ad petendum prosequendum
et recuperandum certas pecuniarum summas et bona sibi debito per nonnullas personas in
quibus ei tenentur asterite per suas obligaciones aut alias et pro premissis ac omnibus causis ipsum tangens
agend' et defend' prout Jura volunt / promisit eciam dictus constituens se Ratum et gratum habere et cetera

Item predictus Johannes hunde in plena curia fatebatur se recipisse a thomam chepman
plenariam solucionem vnius libre grossorum monete flandrie pro qua se fideiusserat
ac plegium et fideiussorem constituerat Alexandri sanchar erga predictum Johannem et cetera

Eodem die Robert blindsel presentavit ballivis et consulibus huius burgi vnam litteram domini
episcopi abirdonensis suo sub signeto clausam / preposito et eis direct' / continen' quod actio inter alexandrum
menyeis et Alexandrum de camera submittitur ei et domino episcopo morauiensis et cetera / et quod
persone summonite vigore litterarum domini nostri Regis penes hanc causam non laborarent
ad obseruandum diem in huiusmodi litteris Regijs limitat' et cetera

Item eodem die coram Alexandro rede vno ballivorum huius burgi comparens Johannes lepar'
filius quondam Johannis lepar' burgensis dicti burgi / fecit constituit creauit et solempniter
ordinauit prouides viros Dauid mathei et Johannem symson' burgenses de
abirdene suos veros legittimos et indubitatos procuratores actores factores et depu
tatos speciales coniunctim et diuisim Ad prosequendum et defendendum ipsius constituen
tis nomine et pro eo quandam terram cum pertinenciis Jacentem in vico furcarum huius burgi
ex parte orientali eiusdem vici inter domum fratrum minorum ex parte boreali et terram
heredum quondam thome croudane ex parte australi sibi nunc pertinen' per vendicionem
Jacobi besat inde fact' iuxta formam et tenorem cuiusdam Instrumenti desuper
ostensi / Ac ad agendum et defendendum pro eo penes dictam terram in omnibus et
singulis / veluti ipse constituens faceret seu facere posset se presens personaliter interesset
promittendo se Ratum et gratum habere in latissima forma procuratorie Testibus
Johanne stewart gilberto leche Nicholaio baxtar alexandro de camera seriando
domino Roberto leis notario publico Johanne quhite et diuersis aliis

Memorandum quod die vjta mensis marcij anno predicto / Alexander sanchar' deuenit plegius legalis thome
de camera vnj balliuorum huius burgi pro Willelmo blindsel iuniore / quod Johannes Waus
et pars sua erunt indempnes de eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris

Item eodem die Alexander rede balliuus cepit Johannem Wormot plegium legalem pro
Johanne Vaus quod Willelmus blindsel iunior et pars sua erunt indempnes
pro eodem Johannem Waus et parte sua aliter quam Jura volunt

Die ixa mensis et annj predictorum thomas de camera et alexander rede ballivi ceperunt
Alexandrum sanquhare plegium legalem pro Willelmo blindsel seniore / quod Johannes
meignes et Dauid mar' et partes sue erunt indempnes de ipso Willelmo et
parte sua aliter quam exigit ordo Juris

Et Dauid mar' inuenit eisdem ballivis Dauid colison plegium legalem pro eo
quod Willelmus blindsel senior et pars sua erunt indempnes de eo et parte sua
aliter quam per viam Juris

Eodem die thomas de camera et alexander rede ballivi predicti ceperunt Andream branche
plegium legalem pro Johanne meignes / quod Willelmus blindsel senior et pars sua
indempnes pro ipso Johannem et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio x die marcij anno predicto /

quo die vxor alexandri Westland et Johannes
henrison ex parte sponse sue per concessiones proprias amerciantur pro infrictione communis ordinacionis in propinacione
ceruisie xij d' Item vxor Willelmi malisson in amerciamento pro causa predicta

xijo die marcij supradicti In curia ballivorum vxores thome quhite et Johannis fichet in vico
nauium adiudicatur videlicet earum quelibet in amerciamento pro propinacione ceruisie xij denariorum

In curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos xv die marcij anno quo supra / Actio plegij prosecutus per thomam
chepman contra et aduersus thomam litstar per processus legittime dictus in hunc diem tanquam quartum et
peremptorem diem per balliuos ponitur in dilacione et continuatur cum consensu parcium propter debilitatem
curie modo et forma quibus nunc existit vsque hodie ad quindenam absque preiudicio parcium / Et pre
fatus thomas chepman in casu quo contingat ipsum illo die non esse presentem constituit fratrem suum Johannem chep
man in vico castri suum legittimum procuratorem ad agendum et defendendum pro se in ista causa et in omnibus aliis
causis ipsum concernentibus / vt Jura volunt / ipso promittens de Rato cum aliis clausulis in latis
sima forma procuratorie

Eodem die deliberatum fuit et ordinatum per assisam / quod si mariota futhes probare poterit
hodie ad quindenam quod quedam patella clamata per dictum Willelmum voket et alienata ab
eodem / fuit sibi inuadiata pro ij s' et xj d' per Jacobum cuke / ipsa erit quieta de iniusta
detencione eiusdem / et deficien' probacione sua predicta satisfaciet eidem domino Willelmo de
dicta patella sine dilacione et cetera Et Idem dominus Willelmus constituit Alexandrum trail suum
procuratorem ad videndum dictam probacionem et ad Recipiendum patellam predictam deficien' de eadem
probacione et cetera
Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxij die marcij anno predicto quo die sectis vocatis et cetera

gilbertus vaus plegius pro Johanne litstar burgense de montros' super quem Dauid Duncane
extendit plegium in manu Johannis Waus seriendi pro iniusta detencione octo librarum et vltra
ad bonum computum / sepe vocatus ad intrandum dictum Johannem tanquam primo die ad sectam dicti
Dauid / non intrauit eundem / quare precipitur seriendo capere districtum de dicto gilberto plegio et cetera
et citare eundem ad comparere faciendum dictum Johannem ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum
diem huius processus

Eodem die penes j li' g' quam quidam lem perwillamson magister sub deo cuiusdam nauis de le fere
clamat sibi deberi per thomam symson burgensem huius burgi / assisa ordinavit quod si dictus thomas potest pro
bare coram ballivis huius burgi per certificacionem legittimam et sufficientem infra annum et diem / quod quidam
Symon copynson habuit vnam libram grossorum ipsius thome quam eundem ordinavit ad soluendum
dicto lem perwilliamson ex parte ipsius thome iuxta tenorem cuiusdam scripti inde per eundem magistrum
nauis product' et quod idem magister est de eadem solutus Idem thomas erit quitus de dicto clameo / Sinautem erit debitor de dicta
libra grossorum soluend' eidem magistro nauis predict' vt Jura volunt / Et hec deli
beracio facta fuit per Robertum blindsel nomine aliorum assise supradicte et cetera

The xxiij dai of marche the yer' et cetera lxxviij yeris Comperit in the tolbuthe be
fore the aldirman balyeis and certane vthiris notable persons / Marion' necolson
vmquhile the spous' of Wil adamson' sayand that scho grantit hir' content
that patrik adamson' hir eldas son' and ayr til the said William p be kennyt and
knawyn as a burges ayr til his croftis of the quhilkis his fadir deit
last vestit and sesyt / and the said patrik is content that the said marion
his modir remain with the franktenment of the said croftis for al the dais
of hir lif scho berand hir in sic fauoris and kyndnes til him as scho has
done of before / and he kepand his part in likewis' til hir'

Item the samyn dai William goldsmyth grantit and sayde before the aldirman balye
is and consale / that gif he failyeis of his preif / that Richard hil sayde that
til him that he suld preve with vj men that war apon the Rais' that war
by quhen the iij pruys' stan' of wax clamyt be the said Richard wes bocht
and pait for et cetera / on friday nixt tocum / he sal cum that dai before the aldirman bal
yeis and consale in the tolbuthe and do that reson' wil anent the said walx et cetera

The xxiiij dai of the moneth of marche forsaid / Dauid galichtly in presence of the aldir
man in the tolbuthe has fundyn Johne symson' souertie til mawnus Wormot to
kepe the said mawnus and Adam bachiler' scaithles anent our Souerane lord
the king and al vtheris person' or personis / of fyve dakyr of hydis deliuerit
til him be the said mawnus / quhilk had thaim in keping in his hous' in put
be adam bachiler' / And the forsaid Dauy is oblist be his hand land and gude
tofreith John' symson' of the said souertie and borowgang befor thir witnes'
Alexander rede Johne stevynson' twa of the ballies and Dauid menyeis eldar.

The xxvj dai of marche the yer' of god et cetera lxxix yeris before the aldirman
balyeis and consale / William goldsmyth for his part and Richard hil on the
tothir part / anent the debate and clame of thre pruys' stane of walx / cla
myt be the said Richard ar' summyttit and oblist thar handis wphaldin
til vndirly the determinacion and ordinance of Alexander of chavmer of murchil Robert
blindsel and patrik badenagh and of quhom thai wil tak to thame

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem xxo nono die marcij
anno Domini et cetera lxxmo nono

Quo die personaliter comparuerunt Dauid mathei et Johannes
symonis burgensis dicti burgi ac procuratores Johannis lepar' ciuis verensis / qui produxe
runt quoddam Instrumentum publicum certas condiciones initas et de terminatas inter Jacobum
besat clericum Abirdonensis diocesis ex vna et dictum Johannem lepar' ex altera partibus
penes empcionem et vendicionem cuiusdam terre ipsius Jacobi Jacente in vico furca
rum huius burgi inter domum fratrum Sancti francisci ex boriali parte et terram quondam thome
crowdan ex australi parte in se continen' videlicet Qui ipse Jacobus vendidit ac in ve
proprietatem tradidit dicto Johannj lepar' dictam terram cum pertinenciis pro qua quidam te
dictus Jacobus recepit quatuor libras grossorum monete flandrie cum med
quas si ipse Jacobus seu quiuis alius ex parte sua restituere reddere et perso
poterit in festo purificacionis vel infra sex ebdomidas post predictum festum datam huius
scripti preceden' / tunc vendicio dicte terre writa et adnichilata erit Sinautem se
predictus venditor / prefatam summam infra terminum prefixum et ordinatum reddere et restitue
re non valuerit / tunc Johannes lepar predictus emptor seruabit et possidebit
dictam terram in veram proprietatem Saluo tamen quod reliquas septem libras cum semis monete
predicto restan' et remanen' / predictus emptor in nundinis penthecostalibus antwerpie
prefato venditori dare et persoluere tenebitur cum presens et personaliter affuerit
cum autem contigerit dictum Jacobum venditorem ante tempus solucionis ex humanis dece
dere seu quocumque alio modo abesse / tunc dictus Johannes lepar dabit et delibe
rabit dictus septem libras cum semis in Abirdonia ad sustentacionem altaris sancti
martinj in ecclesia Sancti Nicholai de Abirdene secundum voluntatem et arbitrum
magistri Alexandri stewart cancellarij morauiensis Jacobi stewart de luchris et
capellanj dicti altaris secundum formam et tenorem dicti Instrumenti huiusmodi condiciones in se plenius
continen' Quibus condicionibus perlectis et recitatis dicti procuratores nomine quo supra pro
testati sunt pro Jure dicti Johannis lepar ac pro proprietate dicte terre cum pertinenciis
sic ut premittitur vendite et alienate / ex eo quod dictus Jacobus seu aliquis ex
parte eius non venerat ad soluendum dictam summam per ipsum receptam infra tempus
limitatum Testibus Andrea scherar' preposito Alexandro de camera filio Johanne stephani
duobus balliuorum Alexandro menyeis Johanne vaus Dauid menyes Roberto prat ma
gistro Willelmo anffray gilberto de camera Adam de crafurd burgensibus et domino Roberto
leis notario cum diuersis aliis

Eodem die magister Willelmus anffray ex vna et Robertus prat partibus ex altera penes
omnes actiones debatabiles inter dictas partes et signant' quo ad annum reddi
tum petitum per dictum magistrum Willelmum / submiserunt se Andree scherar' preposito Alexandro
de camera de murchil alexandro menyes Johanni de Knollis Dauid colison' / Roberto blind
sel et thome vaus in canonia Abirdonensis manen' et promiserunt fideliter se stare arbi
trio et determinacioni eorundem / qui quidem arbiter iurabunt ad fidelem decisionem premissorum
iuxta conscienciam suam et pronunciabunt decretum suum die mercurij proximo futuro

Item eodem die actio plegij prosecutus per thomam chepman aduersus thomam litstar / que continuata fuit
in hunc diem / adhuc continuatur cum consensu Johannis chepman procuratoris dicti thome fratris suj et thome
litstar ac Ade crafurd prelocutoris eiusdem in forma et effectu quibus stetisset isto die vsque diem
Juridicum post pascha proximo futuro absque preiudicio parcium

The samyn day Androw scherar' aldirman alexander chavmer John' of Knollis Robert blindsel and
patrik badenach arbitroris chosin betuix Richard hil and William goldsmyth anent certane
wax clamyt be the said Richard . the saidis parties beand oblist tovndirly thare
determinacion and ordinance in the said matir The quhilkis arbitrouris the gret
aith sworn' and Riply avisit the allegiance of the parties and deposicionis of
the witnes' producit be the said Richard be thaim considerit herd and vndirstandin
decretis ordanis and deliueris that the said William goldsmyth sal content and pay
til Richard hil twa pruys' stan' of wax / and falyeand of the walx twa s'
for ilke pund tharof betuix this and Witsonday nixt tocum but ony langar delay

Die penultima mensis marcij anno Domini et cetera lxxixno Comparens coram preposito et balliuis in pretorio
protribunali sedentibus Thomas scrogis constituit et ordinauit carissimum patrem suum in lege Andre
am Rede de badfothellis alexandrum rede et Robertum blindsel coniunctim et diuisim suos
procuratores legitimos et deputatos speciales in omnibus causis placitis et
querelis motis vel monendis ipsum tangens seu concernens / necnon ad agendum et de
fendendum pro eo constituendo in latissima forma procuratorie Ipso promittens de Rato et cetera

the samyn day in presence of the aldirman and balyeis and diuers' vtheris notabil personis
thomas scrogis and alexander trail grantit thame tobe awand til thom of mar
rys wif for hir husbandis part of the takyl aucht merkis and nyne s'
tobe payt til hir at lammes' next tocum falyeand of the hame cuming
of the said thom of mar hir husband at the fest of lammes forsaid And gif
he cumis than hame that he salhaf ane quartar of the schip of siclike
price as thai haf hir gif it salbe likand til him makand sic like cost as
thai do . And gif he refusis the part of the schip /. thai haf promittit and
grantit that he salbe payt of the said some' of viij merkis and ix s' for the takil
in maner' before expremyt but fraude or gile
Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio quinto die aprilis anno predicto / quo die sectis vocatus et cetera

gilbertus vaus plegius Johannis litstar burgensis de montros secundo die vocatus ad comparere
faciendum eundem Johannem ad sectam Dauid Duncan vt patet in rotulamento primj diei / Non intrauit eundem
Ideo precipitur seriando Johanni vaus capere districtum de dicto plegio / et citare eum ad intrare
faciendum prefatum Johannem ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam tercium diem huius placiti

The samyn dai ser Johne Joffrason' chaplan summonit be the officialis lettres tobere
leil witnessing in thecaus' movit betuix Janet annand on the ta part / and forsyth
Dauyson on the tothir part / his aith beand made before ser John' froster than present in
the court commissar' in that part / deponit and opinly declarit / that he wes present herd
and saw and for witnes tayn / quhen / forsyth Dauyson set a land pertenand til him
til Janet annande for a yer' / and gif it plesit the said Janet / that scho suld
syt langar' in it and forsake it or ony vthir had it / bot gif his modir com to
dwel in it / swa that scho mendit the biging and pait the mayl thankfully

fforsy cowpar ane vthir witnes producit be the said Janet / sworn deponis / that the biging
forsaid is bettirit and nocht warrit / sen Janet annand com todwel in it et cetera

The xvj dai of aprile the yer' of god et cetera lxxix yeris It wes ordanit decretit and
deliuerit be the aldirman and the hail consale of this burgh . that for the offence done be
Dauid hil burges of this burgh to the vicar' of Abirdene on paisch evyn that
last wes / that the said Dauy sulde pay to the biging and Reparacion of the qveyr'
of Sanct Nicholes kirk ten pundis quhilkis ten pundis at the instance and request
of a nobil lady the Countas of huntlee and at the request of mastir thomas
the Waus chantour of murray ar remittit and forgevin to thaim at this tyme
And It is ordanit and fullely deliuerit be the hail consale and with the consent
of the forsaid Dauy hil / that gif evyr it salhappin him til offend til the
said vicar' or til ony vthir man or woman and that it be fundin in his
defaute that he sal pay ten pundis of the vsual payment of scotland to the
biging and reparacion of the qveyr of Sanct Nicholace kirk and tobe rasyt
incontinent and but delay eftir that the offence done be him be notourly knav
yn but fauour or request of ony erdly man or woman' for his lifetym
tobe made

Curia Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xix
die Aprilis anno predicto / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent inferius
quorum quilibet in amerciamento propter absencia videlicet Willelmus de Karnequhin Alexander scot in mar
Alexander rolland Alexander scherar' in balvany Alexander Watson in achorthy Willelmus
androson in Kairnquhochil Johannes panton de petmethen Johannes morison
in Dunbanan Johannes de meldrum alexander sanchar iunior Johannes robertson in strabolgy
Jacobus leche filius alexandri Johannes stevyn

The samyn dai It is decretit and ordanit be the Aldirman consale and communite of Abirdene
that thare be a commission' made and Selit tovouche with the perel of law anent
the landis callit the tulloch clamyt be the larde of Stanywod / And that thar be
commissaris made tharto / til obserue ad kepe the day of summonis contenit in our souerane
lord the kingis lettres purchest be the said larde of stanewod and tovouche with
the perel and charge eftir the tenour of the kingis lettres

the same day henry thomson and mage murray has deponit and declarit be thare
athis that thar wes fyve firlotis of meil j pek and demi pek mare than com
to the proffite of Richard hil of the thre bollis of atis that he clamyt John'
Donaldson' duelland in balhewyis

Item eodem die gilbertus vaus plegius Johannis litstar burgensis de montros tercio die
vocatus ad sectam Dauid Duncan / non comparuit eundem comparere fecit vt debuit vnde
precipitur seriendo capere districtum et cetera

Eodem die Andreas ramsay super quem gilbertus morison alias porrexit
plegium in manu philippi Dunbrek sergeandi / pro iniusta detencione xix solidorum
restan' de maiori summa / sepe vocatus ad comparendum responsurus dicto plegio
tanquam primo die huius processus Non comparuit Ideo precipitur seriendo quod capiat districtum et cetera

Item eodem die accedens ad barram Johannes de Kintor filius et heres quondam
gilberti de Kintor cum prelocutore suo Johanne vaus / qui quidem prolocutor nomine
quo supra protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu xiij solidorum et iiijor d' sibi
Jure hereditario pertinen' et a longo tempore non solut' de quadam terra Jacente
in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem inter terram Ricardi cullan ex austra
li parte et terram gilberti leche ex boriali parte Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentavit in curia
coram ballivis tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus thoma gillespy Willelmo
cummyng scissore et Johanne vaus seriendo

Item the said dai before the aldirman and ballies in the court / thom quhite is be
cumin borch for Johne Donaldson' duelland in balhelvyis for a mele of
meil j f' les tobe payt til Richard hil or his factouris betuix this
and martymes next tocum but langar delay

Item the same day it wes fundin and deliuerit be ane sworn' assise that the borgh
strekit be thom chepman on thom litstar anent a pipe of wad / is of vail /
quharfor thom litstar is ordand topay and content thom chepman within terme of law et cetera

Adam of crafurd on the behalf of thom litstar incontinent eftir the said deliuerance
of the assise / askit at the balyeis toger prise the pipe of wad that
he mycht content thom chepman tharwith in sa fer as it is of vail

Item the said day the consale and communite has chosin thir personis vndir writin tobe sworn'
totax the sowme of sa fer as pertenis to this burgh of the contribucion'
grantit to the mariage of the kingis sistir / that is tosay Dauid colison
Dauy symson' alexander rede alexander howison' gilbert the Waus and Dauid
mathoson' and tobe done with avise of the aldirman / takand to thaim Alexander
of chavmer alexander menyes and Robert blindsel quhen thai wil cal thaim et cetera

Andreas prat in amerciamento pro perturbio mariorie stil prout repert' fuit per assisam / vnde
in partem emende iniungitur ei ad deliberandum dimidium li' cere admissam sancti sanguinis et cetera

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem xxvjto die
Aprilis anno Domini et cetera lxxmo nono

Quo die andreas prat posuit se in voluntate
prepositi et ballivorum pro defamacione assise alias electe in causa perturbacionis fact' per eum
contra marioriam stil / quare adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento et cetera

the assise has fundin and deliuerit be Dauid menyes forspekar that Androw William
more has wrangwisly intromettit with half a hundre eln' of canves of
Alexander redis / and that he aw tocontent him the remanand of the said demic eln' that
he has nocht gottin within terme of law

Dauid prat and thomas gillespy ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbacione adinuicem
Et per assisam ordinatum est quod quilibet dabit dimidium libre cere ad missam sancti sanguinis

Relicta quondam thome smyth amerciatur pro iniusta percussione filij Johannis chepman et
tenetur emendare dampnum ad visum proborum virorum

The last dai of the moneth of aprile forsaid / the consale of this burgh has chosin
Androw scherar aldirman as commissar' and ordanit him topas' til Edinburgh with
a commission' and sufficient power' before the lordis of our Souerane lordis consale
agane the x day of maij nixt tocum with continuacion of dais' til mak avouche
with the charge anent the landis callit the tulloch clamyt be Androw fresal of
Stanewod And toanswer' til our soueran lord and to the said Androw fresal apon al vthir
poyntis and articulis of iniuris as is allegit eftir the fourme and tenour of oure
souerane lordis lettres of summons direct to the aldirman balyeis and communite tharupon

In the court of the burgh of Abirdene haldin in the tolbuthe before the aldirman
and ballies of that ilk the vij day of maij the yer forsaid /. It was decretit
be the court / that quhat penny worthis thom litstar has perofferit and wil deliuer
tobe prisit for the payment of thom chepman of the xj li' for a pipe of wad in
the quhilk he is adiugit of before / that the seriandis sal ressaue the said
poyndis and penny worthis and demayn thame as law wil / for the pay
ment tobe made til thom chepman of the said some'

Eodem die Andreas lammynton' accusatus de iniusta perturbacione et lesione Ricar
di bernys ex precogitata malicia facta conuictus fuit per assisam proborum burgensium
ad hoc iuratorum de dicta lesione sed quitus factus fuit per eandem de precogitata
malicia vnde adiudicatur in amerciamento et emendabit parti lese ad visum proborum virorum

Alexander lammynton in amerciamento pro perturbio dicti Ricardi prout deliberatus fuit per
assisam et tenetur emendare dampnum / Et prefatus Ricardus quitus de perturbacione eorundem

The samyn day the assise chosin and sworn with consent of the parties vndirwritin
that is tosay Dauid Duncan burges of this burgh on the ta part and John' litstar
burges of montros' on the tothir part anent the debatis movit betuix the saidis
parties / Riply avisit has deliuerit and ordanit / that the said Joh Dauy Duncan
sal allow til the said Johne litstar xj s' for ilke elne of clath that he
had fra him in the payment of the wad sald til the said John' litstar And
the said Johne litstar sal bring his prefis before the aldirman or balye
is topreve that theta pipe of wad bocht be him fra the said Dauy
was nocht sa gude as the tothir / And pro toproduce the saidis previs / the aldir
man has assignit to morne at the desir' and with consent of the said John litstar'

the x day of maij the yer' of god lxxix yeris before the aldirman and alexander
rede ane of the ballies of this burgh in the tolbuthe / philp of Dunbrek seriand
distressit gilbert the vaus as borgh for John' litstar burges of montros'
becaus' he enterit nocht the said Johne topreve that the tane of the pipis
of wad bocht be him fra Dauy Duncan was nocht sa gude as the tothir eftir the
tenor of theact aboue writin / And the said gilbert gaf his staf til the seriand
in the name of a distres / the quhilk seriand had warnyt him til entir
the said Johne litstar in the tolbuthe before the balyeis this day xv dais
tomak the said preif payment til the said Dauy Duncan of the sowme
aucht til him / or than topay it his self as borch for the said John' the sam
myn day becaus' he falyeit of the preif et cetera

Thom litstar duelland in the greyn is adiugit in amerciament for breking of common
ordinance in the halding of his nolt fra the common hyrd / as it wes fundin be
ane assise / the quhilk deliuerit that he deforssit the officiar' Duncan straloch distren
yeand him for the hirdis fee et cetera

The samyn day John' glenny has optenit before the aldirman and balyeis in Juge
ment apon' Wil sprunt baxtar xix s' et viij d' for a barrel of flowre / and
tobe pait within lauchful tyme

The xij dai of the moneth of maij forsaid Thom of tulloch of leith constitute
Dauid marr' his lauful procurator til ask and ressaue in his name fra
William malisson' the fadir burges of abirdene / a culveryne and tocontent and pay
him tharfor / eftir the condicion made betuix the said thomas and Wille malisson' the
son' of the said Wilyam / And gif nede be / topersew the said William malisson'
the fadir as law wil for the said culveryn' / the said thomas promittand tohald ferm
and stabil quhatsumeuir thing his said procurator sal do in his name anent the
said matir et cetera before thir witnez John' the Waus / michel skippar'
William of Kyntor and Wil moyses with vthiris sindry

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et Johanne stevynson' vno balliuorum
eiusdem xiiijto die mensis maij anno Domini et cetera lxxixno /

quo die quidam toischach pistor
posuit se in voluntate prepositi pro iniusta perturbacione / ijarum mulierum sunt bonny et Jonete / quare
amerciatur et emendabit eisdem ad visum proborum virorum

Eodem die georgius browne conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in duobus amerciamentis in vno
videlicet pro iniusta perturbacione cuiusdam Ebote et in alio pro perturbio dominj patricij
Willelmi capellani in verbo et emendabit iuxta ordinacionem proborum virorum et cetera

In curia balliuorum huius burgi tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxjo die mensis supradicti / quidam
Jacob nauta adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie pro plegio nomine et ex parte ipsius
extenso super thomam quhite iniuste de detencione certe summe pecunie de precio
vnius barelle olei eidem thome vendite et deliberate prout deliberatum fuit
per assisam Et prefatus thomas quitus a calumpnia sua predicta

Eodem die gilbertus morison in amerciamento pro plegio per ipsum iniuste porrecto super
Andream ramsay de iniusta detencione xix s' et vltra pro certo brasio Et
ipse andreas quitus a clameo suo predicto per Juramentum suum facto ex ordina
cione assise

Item eodem die gilbertus Waus in plena curia deuenit plegius et fideiussor
pro Johanne litstar burgense de montros' ad persoluendum Dauid Duncan summam
duarum marcarum et dimidii marce infra terminum Juris

the samyn dai the consale and brethir of the gilde beand present for the tym has
consentit and ordanit the aldirman to mak expens' and costis of the common'
gude apon the arayment and vthiris necessaris of the play tobe pla
it in the fest of corpus christi nixt tocum et cetera
Curia balliuorum tenta xxij die maij anno quo supra /

quo die Johannes alexandri et Willelmus
verty quilibet eorum in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione et lesione alter alterius
et emendabunt se adinuicem ad visum proborum virorum

Thomas verty in amerciamento pro iniusta lesione Johannis alexandri et emendabit parti lese
de dampno et cetera
